reuters.title: FMI FINANCIAL CORP <FMIF> 4TH QTR NET
reuters.body: Shr seven cts vs 47 cts Net 652,000 vs 11.3 mln Year Shr 2.77 dlrs vs 73 cts Net 77.6 mln vs 16.6 mln NOTE: 1986 year net includes gain 51.0 mln dlrs from sale of American Cellular Telephone Corp shares. 1985 net both periods includes 15.2 mln dlr gain from sale of Washington office building. Reuter 
